ggml-org/ggml

tensor library for machine learning with support for hardware acceleration and model inference

View on index

Related repos

  • Open-source tools for running and improving LLM applications—gateway, observability, data feedback, optimization
  • Neural network library in C from scratch
  • open-source reimplementation of Google’s TensorProcessing Unit by UC Santa Barbara ArchLab
  • DeepEP — communication library for Mixture-of-Experts and expert parallelism, with all-to-all GPU kernels and low-precision support
  • NumPy-based machine learning algorithms built from scratch for learning and transparency
  • TensorTrade: Python framework for building trading algorithms with reinforcement learning
  • C++ library for robotics and vision smoothing, mapping, and sensor fusion
  • Benchmarks LLMs for end-to-end machine learning workflows
